committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to permit the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette River.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #123 (410-5)) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to permit the installation and operation of facilities or other activities for the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette Wild and Scenic River in Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to permit the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette River.
